response.overview: Michele is a boy with Down syndrome who loves to live life in a cheerful and carefree way, always smiling in the face of fate. With his inseparable friend Adriano, a paraplegic teenager, with a lively face and the soul of someone who feels free, they enjoy spending the day between jokes and jokes, leaving traces of their every passage in any corner of the country. Secretly in love with the beautiful Loredana, all occasions are good to see her or spend time with her. Incursions along the main street aboard an Ape driven by Michele cause amusing gags and romantic scenes, such as the almost sanctified vision of the teenager they are in love with.
response.title: Thanks Michele
